phrases: May BLAST have their professional debut
May BLAST have their professional debut Back then, the one thing I had plenty of was my countless number of wishes.
Back then, the one thing I had plenty of was my countless number of wishes.
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
It is the 7th of July?
A bad omen.
What is?
Actually, Nana has not talked like that lately, has she?
Before, she would blame everything on the Demon Lord.
Perhaps she is becoming more of an adult.
That would be nice.
Kyosuke, do you want your eggs sunny-side up or scrambled?
Sunny-side up.
Come to think of it...
Nana does not come by our place as often as she used to.
I do not think I have seen her in quite some time.
How is she doing?
Oh, right.
You could not make it to her roommate's live concert either
because of work.
Well, she is doing okay, but there was something odd about her.
Yeah.
You mean that scent of a new guy in her life?
Although she denies it.
Has she found a job?
Ouch!
Judging by the fact she is said nothing about it, I doubt it.
She said something about wanting to work in sales at a fashionable shop.
But it is been at least a month
since she was fired from her previous job, right?
How is she getting by?
She seems to be managing.
She said she is been taking on temporary jobs to get by.
But it is not like there are that many temporary jobs.
Hmm...
She is registered at a personnel agency
specializing in demonstrators.
What exactly does this demonstrator do?
This is the new product, Raffine Beer.
Please give it a try.
This demonstrator takes part in
campaigns to promote food items newly on the market.
You will find them in the food section of department store basements,
preparing anything from sausages to sliced fruits.
In other words, I am a food saleswoman offering food samples.
I get called for a sales blitz that lasts for two, three days.
I get paid over ten thousand yen a day,
so I took the job to help me out with living expenses for the time being.
But it is actually a lot more fun than I expected.
Anything involving food would seem fun to you, Hachiko.
N-No way!
That is not why.
How should I put it... the interaction with the customers...
- Hey, Nobu, about this part... - Listen to me!
What is it?
I am convinced that working in sales really suits me.
For instance, I am really good at that smiles are free deal.
Then you should find a job at a fast food joint.
If the uniform's cute, then I would love that.
This latest gig from the beer company
requires me to wear a campaign girl-type mini-skirt outfit.
I think I look great in it.
I would have loved to see that.
That old pervert's saying something.
The Milky Way's not visible.
I was so looking forward to seeing it.
Hey, Nobu!
About meeting tomorrow!
Yasu's asking if we could meet there!
Sure!
Since I will get off work just in time for the opening anyway!
Tomorrow...
July 8th?
He says it is okay!
That is right.
Tomorrow is Trapnest's last performance.
The three of you are going, right?
Mhm.
Those VIP seats.
Are they in a special section?
Not really.
They are center seats on the second floor balcony.
I hear you get a great view,
but since you are surrounded by those associated with the band,
and journalists, the section is pretty much dead.
What is that?
Sounds so boring.
But we are not exactly fans,
so I am rather thankful that I will not be sitting between screaming voices.
You should have had Ren get you a seat too, Hachi.
It might not be too late.
Why do not I ask him to make arrangements?
No, I already saw them back home, so never mind.
Besides, I am a bit busy tomorrow anyway.
You have got it wrong!
You hafta write a wish and hang it from a bamboo branch.
A wish?
Do you seriously not know?
- What? - What is the matter?
Well, Shin says he is never seen Tanabata decorations.
Can you believe it?
He just asked me, What is a tanzaku?
Like I asked before, what kind of life have you been living?
Did not you do stuff back in kindergarten?
I want to write a wish on a tanzaku too.
Then should we go to our place to write some?
We have some tanzaku left.
All right!
She did some Tanabata decorations?
I told her not to, since it is embarrassing at her age, but...
All right.
Defeat Trapnest!
Defeat Trapnest!
Defeat Trapnest?
Defeat Trapnest!
Nobu, that is not a wish!
That is a resolution!
Yeah, I guess.
I will write a wish for Nobu.
I want to become taller.
Nobuo.
None of your business!
Besides, you are smaller than me!
But I am still growing.
Sorry to say this, but I will surpass your height in no time.
I think I will wish for that.
I wish that we can get an air conditioner.
I wish that I get back the car I sold.
I would like a veranda where I can decorate some bamboo branches.
I want money.
You guys, cannot you write down some real dreams?
But this room is so damn hot!
Indeed.
My dreams will wither in this heat.
Nana!
The tanzakus are being blown away.
That day the clear skies of Tokyo filled up with clouds in the evening
and we never got to see the Milky Way.
However we ended up staying up all night chatting.
I already knew that wishing alone will not make dreams come true,
but I did feel that each time a dream came true,
I would become that much happier.
May Hachiko find a boyfriend.
(long haired) Nana
Today, we will once again bring you a wide range of special melodies,
from the latest hit songs to nostalgic songs from the past.
We will kick off with a video clip of a group who will be performing
the finale to their first nationwide tour tonight.
Trapnest.
Once the tour is over,.,
I will come directly to see you.
When I do, would you mind cooking for me again?
He will come.
He will not come.
He will come.
He will not come.
He will come.
He will not come.
Oh, no!
Nobody in today's age uses flowers to make predictions anymore!
I may be insane!
I should not hafta use flowers!
I know the answer!
There is no way he is coming.
He did not even reply to my email.
He is probably forgotten all about me.
But just in case...
Even if Takumi does not come, I am positive Ren will come.
There is no big difference in cooking for three people or four people.
I do not know what time they will show up,
so it is got to be food that is tasty even after it is cooled down.
These tomatoes are really delicious.
Where did you get them from?
Is this really okay?
Thank you, Jun-chan.
The two of us cannot eat all this.
They just arrived, so they are really fresh.
Lucky!
Well then, thank you so much, Jun-chan.
Come by again.
- Kyosuke said he would love to see you.
- Mhm.
But look at all the stuff you bought.
Are you expecting someone?
N-Not really.
N-No one's coming.
It is probably for the best for him not to come.
Then I can easily give up on him.
Besides, if Takumi comes over,
I would hafta explain everything to Nana.
There is no way I could hide things any longer.
But if that happens, there would no longer be a reason to hide things.
If Takumi is the kind of guy who would come to see me as he promised,
I would feel less guilty about the situation.
Hey, Hachiko!
Who is going to eat all this?
There is easily enough here for at least five people!
I guess I got a bit carried away.
But I figured he would be hungry after the live performance.
I wonder what time Ren will be here.
Huh?
He is coming?
Did he say he is?
What?
I do not know, but I assumed he would be coming.
Is not he?
I doubt he is.
He never made any such promise.
Why not?!
What do you mean, why not?
His tour ends today,
so would not he come to see you first thing after the concert's over?!
He has not seen you in a month!
He will definitely come!
But tonight they are partying until late to celebrate the end of the tour.
It is not likely he will be able to come here.
Partying until late...
I see.
But he may come after that.
No.
If Ren comes over and stays the night,
you would feel obligated to be hospitable.
So we decided that from now on, whenever we want to meet,
I will go to Ren's place.
He is not going to suddenly show up late at night without my knowledge.
No way.
I was faintly hoping that...
Hoping that Ren would come to see Nana,
and Takumi would tag along
with his casual, maybe I will come along too attitude.
H-Hey...
I do not care even if it were a casual spur of the moment decision.
I just hoped he would come.
Do not let it get you down.
If you want to see Ren I will ask him to drop by again sometime.
He did say he has free time starting tomorrow.
Oh, if you would like I will have him invite Takumi again, and...
No, it is all right!
Do not worry about me!
B-But...
Well, anyway, I do not think he will be able to come today.
I am sorry, considering all the food you prepared.
It is okay.
It really is.
Really, do not worry about it.
I will just put everything in the fridge.
It will last a few days.
What am I doing?
I got carried away all by myself again.
Hey, wait!
I am hungry.
Do you mind if I eat what I can now?
Sure.
Of course you can.
I will get some plates.
This looks really delicious.
Ren does not know what he is missing, losing out on this great feast.
Delicious!
However, seeing the way you are acting, you actually wanted to
go to the final concert with everyone tonight, did not you?
I should have asked Ren about it.
I am really bad at noticing that sorta stuff.
Sorry.
That is not true.
Never mind me, I bet you wanted to go, did not you?
You can be really stubborn.
It is not really about being stubborn.
If I saw the performance,
I would end up comparing myself to her again and get depressed.
As shameful as that is...
This is great too.
Looks like we will be enjoying great food for a while.
I am the one who is lousy at noticing things about others.
I am sorry, for forcing those words outta you.
Thank you very much!
Today's performance is now over.
People are asked to follow the guidance of the staff
and promptly leave the premises.
I am going home.
Huh?
You are not going?
But our pass allows us to go backstage.
I have work to do.
Never mind that.
Come for just a bit.
Sorry.
Give Ren my regards.
What about Reira?
Good job.
That is it?!
Huh?
Where is Yasu?
Is not he with you?
He left, saying he had work to do.
He sends his regards to Ren.
Huh?
What about me?
No way!
I was really looking forward to seeing him.
I guess it was not mutual, Naoki.
I was also looking forward to seeing him.
So it was not mutual?
This is so painful.
Reira, you realize it is hard to come up with a comeback phrase in your case.
It was not mutual?
This is so painful.
Not to mention there are writers around us taking notes.
Take, it is not a laughing matter.
Yasu asked me to tell you that you did a good job.
Wow, what a pretty boy!
Come play with me.
Hey!
Sure, but I am expensive.
One hundred thousand yen per night for the works.
Shin!
You are cute too.
How much?
Ren, save me.
What is up with this person?
I think I am going home.
Come on.
We are partying.
Come join us.
We have got a second and third party lined up, so we will be at it until morning.
Yay!
I am coming, I am coming.
Yay, come, come.
Yeah, I am coming, I am coming.
Gin and tonic.
Are you sure, Nobu?
We are only at the second party.
Should not you slow down with the drinking?
I cannot blend in with this atmosphere unless I am drunk.
Such a pure hearted guy!
I wonder why Yasu went out with such a weird woman.
Weird woman?
The mysteries of Yasu keep building.
I cannot let you talk like that, Nobu.
How dare you talk of our Princess like that.
Takumi...
Sorry to bother you but could you please autograph these?
What.
What is this?
You making me work, even in this place?
Sorry.
I got autographs from the others during breaks at rehearsals,
but you seemed busy so I was going to ask you later, then forgot.
It is a request from a very important sponsor.
Okay, okay.
If it is so important, then you should not forget.
Sorry.
Pull yourself together, manager.
So you are signing them?
Good for you.
I am a mature man, after all.
You are the one who does the musical arrangements
for all the Trapnest songs, right Takumi?
That is right.
And you also produced your latest album, right?
Well, yeah.
So that is why it is so much better than the first one.
Oh?
You are cute.
How about for two hundred thousand yen?
But you are seriously great.
How do you manage to make
such fancy music outta Ren's dark, twisted songs?
Excuse me for writing dark, twisted songs.
Shochu!
But it is all possible because of Ren's songs.
How do you manage to get on everyone is good side?!
By the way, Takumi.
Could you sign an autograph for me, too?
Sure.
But do you have autograph paper?
No I do not.
Just give me one of those.
But these are for an important sponsor.
Give me a break But these are for an important sponsor.
Give me a break
What do I care?
Give me a break
He is just like Nana.
He is just like Nana.
To who?
- Hachiko. - Huh?
Ren, if it is for Hachi,
why not do the favor of having him write out her full name?
What is her full name?
Hachi...
Where have I heard that before?
You met her a while ago, Takumi.
At the mahjongg tournament.
Nana Komatsu.
Oh, yes, Nana.
She may no longer want an autograph from me.
Huh?
But she said she wanted one.
- When? - The day of the mahjongg game.
Then there is no need.
We did it the next day.
Where did Take go?
Wait.
What do you mean, You did it.?
What?
You want me to explain it to you?
She is my girl's best friend.
It is one thing to fool around with women but you have gone too far.
Know your limits.
Do not get all worked up.
It is not as if I forced myself onto her.
She agreed to it.
She was wagging her tail looking all pleased.
Hey, you!
Take, it is nothing.
They are just fooling around.
If you want to fight, let us take it outside.
It is a party for all the tour staff.
Do not spoil it.
- Nobu... - I am going home.
You are going home?
Takumi...
Good job.
The autographs!
Are you all right, Takumi?
Shin is so awesome!
Do not laugh, Reira.
Do not get all upset, Takumi.
You are the one at fault.
I was just telling the truth!
What is wrong with that?!
You think you did absolutely nothing wrong?
I am going home too.
You cannot leave Takumi.
We have still got the third party to go to.
Continue without me.
Takumi, the autographs...
I will redo them tomorrow and send them to you.
Thanks to this, I just remembered something important that I must do.
What?
A woman thing again?
When you see Nobu tell him.
He cannot reach my level even in a hundred years.
He does not have the guts to make a woman his, so stop fussing.
I agree with the second half.
I will give him the message.
What is it at this time of night?
Hey, Hachi...
Hey, Nana...
Why are having a dream come true and achieving happiness
two different things?
I still do not get it, even now.
May Hachiko find a boyfriend.
(long haired) Nana I still do not get it, even now.
May Hachiko find a boyfriend.
(long haired) Nana
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
